DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of a new thickened formula on regurgitation
DOC.brief_title: SWAN: Study on the Tolerance and Efficacy of a New Anti-regurgitation Formula (PC-2016-01)
DOC.criteria: Infants : Aged â‰¤ 5 months old fully formula fed with at least 5 episodes of regurgitation per day, for at least a week Breast fed infants Infants presenting symptoms of a complicated gastroesophageal reflux Infants presenting intestinal disorders
